title: 6 TASTES OF AYURVEDA WITH CRYSTAL
description: Join us March 26th from 3-5pm at Gather in La Quinta for this Ayurvedic workshop on the 6 tastes of food and how they correlate with the 5 elements that make up the 3 doshas. A 45 min Sound Bath will conclude the workshop. $40 PER PERSON Sign up at gatherlaquinta.com click HERE
